title: Analyze Asset Vibration Data
description: A predictive maintenance system has flagged high vibration levels on a large industrial fan. A reliability engineer must analyze the data.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the high vibration alert and retrieve the historical vibration data for the fan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up a trend chart showing a recent spike in vibration.

tasks.description: Perform a Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) analysis on the vibration signal to identify the frequency of the vibration.
tasks.expected_outcome: The FFT analysis shows a peak at the fan's rotational speed, indicating an imbalance.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority work order for the maintenance team to inspect the fan blades for damage and perform a balance check.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a work order with the specific finding of 'imbalance' to guide the maintenance crew.
